messages.content: Initialize the analysis for the target system and configuration.

The configuration is Performance Sensitive: The `keepUnoptimizedFilesPostProcessor` configuration directly influences the processing of unoptimized files, which can lead to significant performance variations depending on the number and size of files being processed. If this configuration is set to keep unoptimized files, it may result in additional memory consumption and processing time, especially if the post-processing involves handling large files or numerous files, thereby impacting overall system performance.
